The Anatomy of Hope: How People Prevail in the Face of Illness bụ akwụkwọ Jerome Groopman dere na 2003
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na mbụ na mpempe akwụkwọ siri ike na Disemba 23, 2003 site na Random House ma na-ekwu maka olileanya na mmetụta ya na ọrịa.
N'akwụkwọ a, Groopman na-enyocha otú olile anya si emetụta ụmụ mmadụ na-anata nlekọta ahụike ma ọ bụ nwere onye òtù ezinụlọ na-arịa ọrịa siri ike
Ọ na-amata ọdịiche dị n'etiti ụdị olileanya, dị ka ma mmadụ ọ̀ na-enwe olileanya ụgha ma ọ bụ na o nweghị
Maka akwụkwọ ahụ, Groopman na-eleta ọtụtụ ụlọ nyocha ndị na-enyocha ihe ndabere ndụ nke olile anya iji chọpụta ma olileanya nwere ike gbanwee ahụike mmadụ na sayensị ma ọ bụ enweghị..

Mmeghachi omume dị mma maka Anatomy of Hope abụwo nke ọma. The New York Times toro Groopman maka ịkọwaghị olileanya n'ụzọ doro anya n"akwụkwọ ahụ, ebe ha chere na nke a mere ka ọrụ ahụ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma karịa nʼinye echiche ya.
N'afọ 2007, HBO malitere ịrụ ọrụ ịmeputa ihe onyoonyo nke dabeere na akwụkwọ ahụ nke ndị nyere aka wee dee ya bu ndị na-ede ihe nkiri Rafael Yglesias na Tom Schulman
J, Abrams ga-emepụta ma duzie, ga na-abụ ihe nkiri ahụike. E mepụtara ihe omume ụgbọelu ma mee ka John Ortiz, Simon Callow, na Valarie Pettiford pụta, mana usoro ahụ emeghị.
